column4: how can there not be one reference to gnome-window-decorator on the forums
try g-w-d :) or tell us your problem

im trying to use compiz and xgl, but everytime i run gnome-window-decorator it restarts x, i previously made it run b4 without a problem, now all the sudden it just keeps restarting my x when i try it
start g-w-d after compiz --replace gconf &. if that's not the problem, be sure you use compiz-gnome (dont recall the package name exactly)
